events.title: QML talk
events.content: A PhD student from Imperial will describe his research in quantum machine learning. Stay tuned for more details!

events.title: Maria Violaris Talk
events.content: Ms. Maria Violaris is a PhD student at Oxford and one of the rising starts of the field! She founded Oxford Quantum Information society, did 2 internships at Riverlane and IBM. She is a contributor for the Physics World magazine, and a researcher in the foundations of quantum mechanics and applications of quantum technology.
